appsgate.lig.context.device.name.table.spec
Interface DeviceNameTableSpec

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeviceNameTableImpl
public interface DeviceNameTableSpec

Table that allow users to rename devices and services as they want. The name can be whatever and is use for display.

Version:
1.0.0
